means: 古代北欧使用的文字，诗歌( rune的名词复数 )

sentence.Network_en: Harry was plucking his guitar again, banging out the latest popular runes.
sentence.Network_cn: 哈里又在拔弄他的吉他, 响亮地弹奏着最新的流行曲子.

sentence.Network_en: Weapon Mastery talent runes now have a level requirement of 20.
sentence.Network_cn: 武器掌握天赋符石现在要求20级才能使用.

sentence.Network_en: Stat runes ( found after character creation ) have been improved.
sentence.Network_cn: 属性符石 ( 人物创建以后得到的 ) 被改良了.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 一个是灵魂符文石(runes)，另一个是强化宝石而玩家可以透过npc，在备妥上述要件后来进行魂之力(Soul Ability)的镶嵌，镶嵌后的属 …

list.abs: 详见神符之语(rune words)PS:神符之语的材料必须是会灰色物品~！！你的暗金的斧头不行的~有问题再补充~

找游戏上U77 ... ·圣犬帕拉 Paladog ·神迹突击 Rune Raiders ·杰克的铁匠店 Jacksmith.
骑士->卢恩骑士(Rune Knight)猎人->游侠(Ranger)刺客->十字切割者(Guillotine Cross)牧师->大主教(Archbishop)巫师->术士(Warlock).

entry.tran: 如尼字母，如尼文（古代北欧人使用的一种刻在石头或木头上并被认为有神奇力量的文字）
entry.def: Runes are letters from an alphabet that was used by people in Northern Europe in former times. They were carved on wood or stone and were believed to have magical powers.

auth_sentence.content: Beware the bible sellers & new agers selling runes & crystals.
